definition: arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: In both cases the women accused of posting the profiles denied it.
sentences.chinese: 两个案子中，被指称发帖的女性都矢口否认。

sentences.english: When asked whether they support discrimination, however, they issue a blanket denial.
sentences.chinese: 然而当问及他们是否支持歧视时，他们矢口否认。

sentences.english: Jiangchuan is there a Chinese girl, ask the island denied.
sentences.chinese: 江川问其是否有中国姑娘，小岛矢口否认。

definition: to arbitrarily assert/to allege/to stick to one's statement/to cling to one's view
to declare to be untrue/to deny
to speak evasively (idiom); beating about the bush
to refuse to admit (what one has done)/to disavow/to renege
to explain/to justify/to defend (a point of view etc)/to provide an explanation/to try to defend oneself
variant of 污衊|污蔑[wu1 mie4]
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
